ComicInfo.Summary:
A relaxing trip to a secluded lake house sounds like an awesome way to spend a girls’ weekend, doesn’t it? Only one thing can spoil the fun… and that’s a band of brutal murderers who have weekend plans of their own. The Auger Clan is going hunting… and college girls are their prey! The lake house has been outfitted with an array of violent deathtraps, and it won’t be long before the body count starts to rise!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/night-trap-2/4000-449361/
